comics.title: Precedence Day
comics.hoverText: Not to be confused with Precedents day, when we celebrate all the loud opinions we shared a long time ago and have to keep standing by to avoid looking foolish.

comics.title: Disorient Express
comics.hoverText: Excuse me sir, are you the murder victim? ANSWER ME!

comics.title: Good Old Fashioned Gambling
comics.hoverText: And put all my children on that angry-looking one with the glass eye!

comics.title: Circle of Life
comics.hoverText: My favorites are the milkweed flavored ones.

comics.title: Can of Peas
comics.hoverText: Not many options if you don't have a can opener.

comics.title: Ring of Invisibility
comics.hoverText: Sauron will be able to see me and hunt me down? Eh, fair trade.

comics.title: Ivory
comics.hoverText: I can hardly poach a single egg, let alone a whole elephant
